thread.title: Zooming into the lives of hotel suppliers
thread.title_full: Zooming into the lives of hotel suppliers

author: Deccan
title: Zooming into the lives of hotel suppliers
text:
Deccan Chronicle | Priya Sreekumar | October 01, 2015, 00.32 am Hemant Menon There have been films made on the life of business tycoons who run hotels but here is a film that strives to look at the life of hotel suppliers, titled Zoom. Directed by Anish Varma, the film has young stars like Bhagat, Hemant, Sreejith Ravi and Gauri in the lead. Talking about the film, its director Anish says, “It is about some incidents that happen in a hotel including a murder.
This will be a comedy investigative thriller and the shoot is half way through with some part of the shoot to be canned in Goa and Sri Lanka.” This is Anish’s third film and he has also worked with Suresh Gopi in the past.
